parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Charging System Failure due to Magnet Detachment
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the charging system can cause the engine to seize or fail, leading to a loss of control and potentially resulting in a crash.
symptoms: The charging system is not functioning properly
the engine may seize or fail
the magnets may become dislodged and cause catastrophic engine failure.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Electrical Power Loss due to Faulty Connector
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The loss of electrical power can cause the motorcycle to stall or shut down while in motion, leading to a loss of control and potentially resulting in a crash.
symptoms: the indicator lights may come on and then the motorcycle loses power.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The crack in the fuel tank can cause fuel to leak, which can lead to a fire hazard, especially when the leaked fuel comes into contact with the hot engine or heat shield.
symptoms: Fuel leaks from the bottom of the tank
fuel leaks from the spot welds
fuel drips onto the aluminum heat shield

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the flywheel magnets can cause vibrations, charging issues, and potentially lead to engine damage, which can result in costly repairs and pose a safety risk to the rider.
symptoms: scratching or damage to the stator
pieces of magnet debris inside the engine.
